name: obsidian-zotero-annotations
description: Plugin to import and format annotations from Zotero

scripts.release: node esbuild.config.mjs production && mkdir -p obsidian-zotero-annotations && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css obsidian-zotero-annotations/ && zip -r obsidian-zotero-annotations.zip obsidian-zotero-annotations/ && rm -rf obsidian-zotero-annotations/
